entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 50
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 3 Photos from the special event 1983-0104 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā, What Are You Here for, Sholapur, Maharashtra, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 3 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 3 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1983.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention 3 new galleries Śhuddhi Camp by a photographer, Śhuddhi Camp by a Golden Builder, and Ealing.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 45
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 16 Photos from the special event 1984-1000 Cruise on Yangtze River, China have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 16 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 16 Photos of this event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1984.
The event will also have 49 photos Moments of Joy, among which many depict the beauty of the Yangtze River and as such could be used for showing slides during Public Programs in connection to thoughtless awareness. They will be uploaded gradually next week: the direct link to these 49 photos in the smallest gallery will be China Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the two links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
